title: Define GCP batch job spec for MVP runs
scope: Define a minimal, stable job spec for running the MVP pipeline in GCP (inputs, outputs, mode, config, model refs).
Include deterministic identifiers (match_id/run_id) and explicit timeouts.
Keep the spec portable (no machine-specific absolute paths).
acceptance: A JSON schema exists for the job spec and is used by tooling (validation).
Job spec includes GCS input URI, GCS output prefix, mode (gcp_speed|gcp_low_cost), match_id, and run_id.
Spec forbids embedding local absolute paths; only portable refs are allowed.

deliverables.title: Job spec schema and parser
acceptance: Schema validates required fields (including match_id + run_id) and rejects machine-specific paths.
Parser loads spec deterministically and normalizes defaults.
evidence: A sample job spec validates and is used in a local dry-run command.

subtasks.title: Draft job spec schema and defaults.
done_when: job_spec.schema.json exists with required fields for inputs/outputs/mode.
job_spec.py validates and normalizes a spec deterministically.
